summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing additional expenditures for maintenance and maintenance planning; increasing expenditure allowances in the 1983 budgets of various City departments, to provide for certain unforeseen expenditures by appropriation from the Emergency Fund; making an appropriation from the Administrative Services Fund; establishing new positions; abandoning and reappropriating $50,000 in unexpended project balance in the Cumulative Reserve Fund, Main Fund; and declaring the emergency therefor.
